message: Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this unique product. Given its exceptional qualities and rarity, I'm offering it to you for $5000000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a much lower price. I'm interested in the product, but $5000000 is out of my budget. I'd like to propose a counteroffer.

I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, I can't accept an offer of $400000. I'm still confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you somewhere in the middle. My counteroffer is $4000000.
Bob, I understand your initial hesitation, but I believe the value of this product justifies a higher price. I'm willing to come down from my initial offer. My counteroffer is $4000000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $4000000 is still significantly higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'm going to have to make a more substantial counteroffer if we're going to reach an agreement. I'm thinking more along the lines of $600000, which is a serious commitment from my side.
Bob, I see your perspective and I understand. However, I'm confident in the uniqueness of this product. Given the market value, I can't go down to $600000. My counteroffer to you is $3000000.
Bob, I appreciate you coming back with a higher counter offer. I'm willing to come down even further, considering the value of our negotiation. My counteroffer is $3000000.

Alice, I'm glad we're making progress, but $3000000 is still far beyond my budget. I'm starting to think that we might not be able to reach a mutually agreeable price. However, I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I'll meet you in the middle of my previous offer and your current price, which would be $1800000.
